And yes I realize this implies that Trump went to a viewing of Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom, pointed at the screen and DIDN'T yell "A Thesaurus!"

I like to dream of Trump actually caring we know he used the n-word just so that one day, my future child--a college history major--will enter the Nat'l Archives, tap an employee & ask "Excuse me. Can you tell me which floor I can view the official White House n-word thesaurus?"
